Thanks For Registering!
Thank you {{lead.First Name:default=EMS Professional}} for registering for this complimentary live webinar. You will receive a reminder email one day prior to the live webinar. Your webinar information is listed to the right.
Doug and Kelly look forward to an engaging discussion on Thursday, August 30 and are glad you've decided to join. See you online on August 30th! Questions? Cheri Lane, Marketing Communication Manager
800-537-3927, ext. #6278 cheri.lane@tritech.com <mailto:cheri.lane@tritech.com> WEBINAR DETAILS JOIN LINK:

TIME: 2 PM ET l 1 PM CT l Noon MT l 11 AM PT
SPEAKERS:
PRESENTER : Doug Wolfberg of Page, Wolfberg, and Wirth
MODERATOR: Kelly Wachal - TriTech Supervisor of Customer Service and Education
